NI Security:Login Method

Short Name: NI Security.Login

Requires: Base Development System

Class: Application Methods

To Use: Create a method.

Logs a user into the NI domain.

Parameters

Data typeNameRequiredDescription
NI DomainYesSpecifies the domain to which you want to log in. You can configure the domain using the Domain Account Manager.
User NameYesThe name used to log in to the domain. You can configure the user name using the Domain Account Manager.
PasswordYesThe password used to log in to the domain. You can configure the password using the Domain Account Manager.
Password Expiration TimeYesSpecifies when the password is set to expire. You can configure the password expiration time using the Domain Account Manager.

Remarks

The following table lists the characteristics of this method.

Data typeNo return value
Available in Run-Time EngineYes (Read/Write)
Available in Real-Time Operating SystemYes
Remote access allowedNo
